TopicTitle: Need 3 tanks modeled for a mod

Articles.Content:
HI,

I'm working on updating the old L-Tech mod.  As part of this, I've asked a couple of modders to make me some new parts for the mod.  All parts are covered except for some tanks.

The mod currently uses the stock RCStankRadialLong.  

The mod defines three resources

  • Model Rockets
  • Snacks
  • Clipboards

I'm not sure yet if the Snacks will stay the same, due to there being Snacks as Life Support in other mods.  Regardless, I'm asking if someone would want to step up and make me the tanks.  They could all use the same model, and just change the skin for each type.

Thanks
